summary: This mod adds The Bound Bow and Arrows as Inventory Items!
descriptionHtml:
Sorry if my english is bad.
This mod simply adds the Bound Bow and Arrows. They are normal Items called "Permanent Bow" and "Permanent Arrow".
You can craft the Permanent Bow and Arrows on any Smithing forge:
- 1 Permanent Bow = 1 Daedric Bow
- 1 Permanent Arrow = 1 Daedric Arrow
- 50 permanent Arrows = 50 Daedric Arrows
- 100 permanent Arrows = 100 Daedric Arrows

The Permanent Bow can be upgraded with 3 Ebonyingots.

NO PERKS REQUIRED FOR CRAFTING
author: Ninjaun1x
